narrative.narrative: Australian air Express is is cargo airline that is part of the Qantas Group. It was founded in 1992 as a joint venture with Australia Post, in 2012 Qantas acquired the other 50% of the airline. It calls Melbourne it's main hub. 16 airports across all of Australia are served, but none outside Australia. It's fleet consists of four 737-300F's,two BAe 146-300's, a BAe 146-100 and a Fairchild Metroliner.
